cause.description:
i will accept most donations (any form of help is always welcome) to help MY cause which is to restock and provide with the necessary provision for MY drinking session MAKE NOTE THAT ALL DONATIONS WILL GO DIRECTLY AND STRICLTY TO THOSE IN NEED WHICH IS ME so thank you in advance for your help
OBIOSLY NO ONE IS GOING TO DONATE SHIT SO JUST DONATE BY POSTING ON THE WALL
AND IF YOU REALLY WANT TO DONATE I EXCEPT ONLY CASH OR LCBO GIFTCARDS do not click on the donate buttom thats bullshit
AND LET THE DRINKING BEGIN
1. help your self by helping me
2. mas servesa mas felis
cause.mission: TO BUY ME beer and RUM etc.
cause.name: HELP SAM
